p: We then assume the viral debris and particles then made land fall in the Wuhan and related regions about a month to 6 weeks later resulting in first cases of the viral pneumonia caused by COVID-19 emerging in Wuhan regions late November 2019-early December 2019 ( Cohen, 2020; Huang et al., 2020). Such an hypothesis is indeed consistent with the striking patterns shown in Fig. 7. And it makes, therefore, an extraordinary set of predictions, that we will explore at some length in our conclusions.
